aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Legal excellence and commitment to results that transform businesses and protect interests.
aboutPage.storyContent1: Juris Company was founded in 2019, through the initiative of its CEO, who identified the need to build a legal space with its own identity, institutional solidity, and vision for the future. The idea emerged after professional experiences in other law firms, still at the beginning of his career, when, as an intern, he matured the purpose of creating an environment that represented evolution, belonging, and professional autonomy.
aboutPage.storyContent2: Driven by the commitment to contribute to strengthening legal practice in Amapá, as well as to give back the learning and opportunities received throughout his career, the CEO envisioned an innovative concept: bringing together independent lawyers in the same environment, structured to promote integration, collaboration, and collective professional growth.
aboutPage.storyContent3: With the completion of construction in September 2021, Juris Company was officially inaugurated, materializing this differentiated model of practice, based on valuing independent legal practice, institutional organization, and technical excellence. Currently, Juris Company brings together twenty-six independent lawyers, working in the most diverse areas of Law, all sharing the commitment to ethics, responsibility, and excellence in providing legal services.
aboutPage.missionText: To promote integration, collaboration, and collective professional growth among independent lawyers, offering qualified, humane, and efficient service to clients and the entire team that is part of the firm.
aboutPage.visionText: To be a reference in legal practice in Amapá, standing out for valuing independent legal practice, institutional organization, and technical excellence, building a space that represents evolution, belonging, and professional autonomy.
